title: A New Dawn
description: A person who's the hero of their own story could be a villain in yours. A New Dawn is a dystopian, science-fiction story of three families, from three different times, who try to live their normal lives but inadvertently seem to impact each other. Follow their journey as they navigate how intricately entwined their lives are through time.How will they navigate a world that's changing right before their eyes?Will they be able to hold onto their loved ones?
author: Jiya Kaye
